definition: Moments (social networking function of smartphone app WeChat 微信[Wei1 xin4])
circle/ring/loop/classifier for loops, orbits, laps of race etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to surround/to circle
to confine/to lock up/to pen in

sentences.english: My business got jump-started by my "circle of friends".
sentences.chinese: 我的業務得到重新啓動，由我的“朋友圈”。

sentences.english: She has a circle of friends and she participates in activities at her kids' school.
sentences.chinese: 她現在有自己的朋友圈，參加孩子學校的各種活動。

sentences.english: Opportunities to expand your circle of friends will result in possible new romantic encounters.
sentences.chinese: 擴展朋友圈時可能會給你帶來浪漫機遇。

sentences.english: It's known that the micro blog and friends circle are quite popular in China.
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知，微博和朋友圈在中國廣受歡迎。

sentences.english: You will expand your circle of friends if you join groups.
sentences.chinese: 如果參加團體，你的朋友圈將得以擴展。

sentences.english: Use Twitter to keep your fans in the loop.
sentences.chinese: 利用“碎碎念”來留住你朋友圈中的粉絲。

sentences.english: Propel the message still wider to their own ever-increasing circles of friends and associates.
sentences.chinese: 把消息發給自己不斷擴大的朋友圈和同事圈。

sentences.english: They currently have more than 400 regular clients on WeChat.
sentences.chinese: 我們現在已通過微信朋友圈發展客戶400餘人。

sentences.english: Her circle of friends includes both single and married women.
sentences.chinese: 她的朋友圈既有單身女性，也有已婚女性。

definition: to transmit/to forward (mail, SMS, packets of data)/to pass on/to republish (an article from another publication)
Weixin or WeChat (mobile text and voice messaging service developed by Tencent 騰訊|腾讯[Teng2 xun4])
tweet (on Twitter)/(HK, Tw) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/to reply to original poster (or recommend a post) on PTT bulletin board
to send to multiple recipients/mass mailout/to occur in a clustered fashion
to sticky (an Internet forum thread etc)
to share (let others have some of sth good)
